title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2015 - Thessaloniki, Greece
description:
For the first time, we're excited to host GDCR in Thessaloniki! 
We'll be sending information using our Java meetup (http://www.meetup.com/Thessaloniki-Java-Meetup-Group/) and twitter accounts (http://twitter.com/skg_jug) so stay tuned
